00195         SPtr<Visual<Vec3,Trfm3,App3> > convert() {
00196             //Create the geometry
00197             int tempSize = numOfFaces*3;
00198             Vec3 vertexArray[tempSize];
00199             Vec3 normalArray[tempSize];
00200             Vec2 texCoordArray[tempSize];
00201             for(int f=0; f<numOfFaces; f++) {
00202                 SPtr<OBJFace> face(faces->get(f));
00203 
00204                 for(int i=0; i<3; i++) {
00205                     vertexArray[(f*3)+i] = *vertices.get(face->vertexIndices[i]-1);
00206 
00207                     if(hasTexCoords) {
00208                         texCoordArray[(f*3)+i] = *texCoords.get(face->texCoordIndices[i]-1);
00209                     }
00210                     if(hasNormals) {
00211                         normalArray[(f*3)+i] = *normals.get(face->normalIndices[i]-1);
00212                     }
00213                 }
00214             }
00215             
00216             SPtr<Geom<Vec3,Trfm3,App3> > model;
00217             if(hasTexCoords && hasNormals) {
00218                 SPtr<Trimesh> t(new Trimesh(Trimesh::TRIANGLES,vertexArray,normalArray,tempSize,tempSize));
00219                 SPtr<TexCoord> tc(new TexCoord(tempSize*2));
00220                 for(int j=0; j<tempSize;j++) {
00221                     tc->addCoord(texCoordArray[j]);
00222                 }
00223                 t->addTexCoords(tc);
00224                 model = GetNode::newGeom3D(name,t);
00225             }
00226             else if(hasNormals) {
00227                 SPtr<Trimesh> t(new Trimesh(Trimesh::TRIANGLES,vertexArray,normalArray,tempSize,tempSize));
00228                 model = GetNode::newGeom3D(name,t);
00229             }
00230             else {
00231                 SPtr<Trimesh> t(new Trimesh(Trimesh::TRIANGLES,vertexArray,tempSize));
00232                 model = GetNode::newGeom3D(name,t);
00233             }
00234 
00235             //Create the material
00236             if(mtl.get()) {
00237                 model->getLocalAppearance().override(App::MATERIAL);
00238                 
00239                 SPtr<Material> newMat(new Material());
00240                 newMat->setShininess(mtl->shininess);
00241                 newMat->setAmbient(mtl->ambient);
00242                 newMat->setDiffuse(mtl->diffuse);
00243                 newMat->setSpecular(mtl->specular);
00244 
00245                 model->getLocalAppearance().setMaterial(newMat);
00246                 if(mtl->alpha < 1) {
00247                     model->getLocalAppearance().override(App::ALPHA);
00248 
00249                     SPtr<Alpha> tran(new Alpha(mtl->alpha));
00250                     model->getLocalAppearance().setAlpha(tran);
00251                 }
00252 
00253                 for(int i=0; i<mtl->textures->size(); i++) {
00254                     model->getLocalAppearance().addTexture(ResourceManager::instance()->getTexture(mtl->textures->get(i)->str));
00255                 }
00256             }
00257 
00258             return model;
00259         }
00260     };
